name: Space GATTAI!!
description:
Go on an adventure, play with cool robot toys, combine giant fighting robots into EVEN bigger Super Fighting Robots!!

Space GATTAI!! is a bombastic rpg for 2 - 5 players where you use interlocking plastic robot toys like LEGO Bionicle or other kinds plastic robot model kits to collaboratively create your very own Super Fighting Robot and battle the forces of evil.

This game is a hack of Space Goblins by Viditya Voleti and Tunnel Goons by  Nate Treme
